Honeymoon in Bora Bora

Rating:

5 out of 5

Price:

$$$$$$$

Address:

Magical, tropical island northwest of Tahiti in French Polynesia.

You wanna see this sexy minx in a barely-there g-banger? She's got one with Bora Bora written all over it. Not literally, because it's so small the words won't even fit.
